Report lo. 16
3-16-56
TO; NAEB Board of Directors
FROMj Frank S. Schooley
RE; New Regions, Regional meetings
•actors *
One action on which youy president may have been remiss in last couple of
months is in activating program to form new region in the Far West, and to
push for regional meetings this year. Either before, or no later than
Columbus Board meeting, you®11 have definite recommendations. Meanwhile,
if you have firm suggestions, please fire away. It may interest 'yor. to know
that the president had just two responses from members when he asked for
definite suggestions on re-regionalizing.
FES;jy
ce; Skomia
Cohn & Marks
